casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Albert Lee STEVENSON, Jr. No. 50P00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 11, 2015. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Albert Lee Stevenson, Jr., Nashville, for Stevenson, Albert Lee Jr. Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of December 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of December 2015."
